document.full_text: a former connecticut man was sentenced on tuesday to 45 years in prison followed by a life term of parole for making and distributing child pornography during his abuse of an eight-year old girl several years ago.
document.title: former conn. man sentenced to 45 years in child pornography case
lines_and_colors: a former connecticut man was sentenced on tuesday to 45 years in prison followed by a life term of parole for making and distributing child pornography during his abuse of an eight-year old girl several years ago.
